docinfo.docinfo:doc-heading: [454,585] Form 122 PETITION: PARLIAMENTARY ELECTORATES ETC ACT 1912

heading.title: [454,585] Form 122 PETITION: PARLIAMENTARY ELECTORATES ETC ACT 1912

leg:level-vrnt.toc-caption: [454,585] Form 122 PETITION: PARLIAMENTARY ELECTORATES ETC ACT 1912

text.emph: (Petition under the Parliamentary Electorates and Elections Act 1912.)
(To be set out in accordance with Form 1)

p.text: To the Court of Disputed Returns—

text.emph: (The statement of facts shall be divided into paragraphs numbered consecutively, each paragraph being as far as possible confined to a distinct portion of the subject matter. The facts shall include a description of the petitioner in terms of section 157(c) of the subject Act, the date and result of the election, the date on which the writ was returned and the facts relied on to invalidate the election or return.)

p.text: You are liable to suffer judgment or an order against you unless the prescribed form of notice of your appearance is received in the Registry (or where a place in the Riverina or the Central West or the Northern Rivers district is the nominated place of the trial, "or Sub-Registry") within 14 days after service of this petition upon you.

text.emph: (where a place in the Riverina is the nominated place of trial, add

p.text: "Sub-Registries: the offices of clerks of the Court at Albury, Cootamundra, Deniliquin, Griffith, Gundagai, Leeton, Narrandera, Temora and Tumut")

text.emph: (where a place in the Central West is the nominated place of trial, add

p.text: "Sub-Registries: the offices of the clerks of the Court at Bathurst, Cowra, Dubbo, Forbes, Lithgow, Mudgee, Parkes and Wellington")

text.emph: (where a place in the Northern Rivers district is the nominated place of trial, add

p.text: "Sub-Registries: the offices of the clerks of the Court at Ballina, Bellingen, Byron Bay, Casino, Coffs Harbour, Dorrigo, Glen Innes, Grafton, Kempsey, Kyogle, Macksville, Maclean, Mullumbimby, Murwillumbah, Port Macquarie, Tenterfield, Tweed Heads and Wauchope")
Signed by the Petitioner in our presence at (place) on (date).

text.emph: (The rules which apply where a deponent making an affidavit is illiterate or blind shall apply in respect of each witness, making such changes as it is necessary to make, where a petitioner is illiterate or blind.)

p.text: [Form 122 insrt Amendment 67: Gaz 52 of 27 May 1977 p 2077 ; am Gaz 62 of 24 April 1981 p 2355 ; Amendment 136: Gaz 96 of 8 July 1983 p 3146 ; Amendment 158: Gaz 170 of 7 December 1984 p 5998 ; Amendment 189: Gaz 169 of 24 October 1986 p 5203 ; Amendment 192: Gaz 36 of 20 February 1987 p 893 ; Amendment 210: Gaz 138 of 26 August 1988 p 4486]
